metadata.title: CVE-2015-7542 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability exists in libgwenhywfar through 4.12.0 due to the usage ofoutdated bundled CA certificates.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7542` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gwenhywfar-tools - 4.15.2beta-2build1
libgwengui-cpp0 - 4.15.2beta-2build1
libgwengui-fox16-0 - 4.15.2beta-2build1
libgwengui-gtk2-0 - 4.15.2beta-2build1
libgwengui-qt4-0 - 4.15.2beta-2build1
libgwenhywfar-data - 4.15.2beta-2build1
libgwenhywfar60 - 4.15.2beta-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgwenhywfar package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.2beta-2build1').
